Comment.value: after pc has agreed to work with Momma Ji.

value.0: "If you are done gathering your reward, just head for the exit. I'll catch up with you."

Comment.value: when Momma Ji, as the beholder appears, she should fire paralyzing bolts at any surviving henchmen and then initiate dialogue with the pc. She should be plot during the entire exchange and only remove the plot flag if the PC decides to attack her through dialogue.

value.0: A beholder passes through the floor before you and begins to laugh. "So, my grandchild is everything I ever hoped for. You have done me proud, <FirstName>."
"Don't worry about your friends. They are still alive, just unconscious for a while. I thought it better if we could talk in private."
"Oh don't be such a bore. I had to come here by a deeper route, that is all. It's just sweet, old Momma Dane. Don't let this beholder form fool you."
"Of course I am Momma Dane... or, that is a name I go by... sometimes. I simply had to come here by a deeper route, that is all. Do not let the form of a beholder fool you."
"Oh, come now, young <man/woman>. You know who I am. I am sweet, old Momma Dane. Don't let this beholder form fool you - I simply had to come here by a deeper route, is all."

Comment.value: change beholder into Momma Ji

value.0: "Does this form make you more comfortable? Aren't I a kindly old lady? Ha, ha, ha!"
"But maybe this isn't the form you would find most interesting? Who would you like me to be?"

Comment.value: turns into Calibast

value.0: "I can be the man of your dreams. A sexual god. Or perhaps someone closer to you than that. How is this for a hot lover?"

Comment.value: turn into Sir Becket

value.0: "Or maybe you would like to play with the bad boys? Does this form please you, my lady?"

Comment.value: change Momma Ji into Kaidala

value.0: "I can be the woman of your dreams. A sexual goddess. Or perhaps someone closer to you than that."

Comment.value: change kaidala to Enivid

value.0: "Then again, maybe you would be more interested in a good-by-day, bad-by-night woman? Does this form please you, my lord?"
"What is a true form? I haven't stayed a single form in so many centuries, I doubt I could remember what I looked like."

Comment.value: change into succubus with wings.

value.0: "I suppose the form I took during most of my training is the closest thing to my true nature. Here... what do you think?"
"I was the personal assassin for a very powerful devil at one time. Before he was... destroyed; though I imagine he will not be gone forever."
"He made me... from the couplings of succubi and dopplegangers. There were others like me, but they are all dead now. Killed in various missions for my former master."
"I do not like to think of myself as evil, no. I am a survivor and I do what I must to stay alive. Sometimes that means taking evil actions. Sometimes it means saving a life."
"I am part demon, as are you. The part of me that is doppleganger gives me more clarity of thought and less of the absolute need for chaos that my demon half craves."
"I do not wish to say his name, lest he be alive and I draw his attention to my activities on this plane of existence."
"He would not be happy with some of the choices I have made. It is of no mattter to you, at least not right now. Maybe someday in the future we will discuss these things."
"I wish to cement our relationship. I want you to be my ally. To that end I will answer any questions you have. I imagine the curiosity about your heritage must be burning you up inside."
"Really? Good. What have you decided?"

"The first reason is that I need someone to help me gain access to the army of the undead who waits in another plane. If you have done your research properly, you will already know something about the army."
"Excellent. You show more promise than I dared to hope. I am proud to call you my grandchild. There is more you should know about this army and the plane they come from."
"Pitiful. I cannot believe you are actually my kin. Very well, I shall tell you."
"There is an ancient magic that was wrought when this keep was first built. There was an ancient gate built to another plane, that stood not far removed from here."
"The other plane contained an army of undead creatures. No one knows what happened to them, for no one has ever survived a trip to their lands."
"The land itself is entirely dead. Any living creature that sets foot upon it, or breathes the air in it, begins to immediately decay and die."
"When the undead army enters our plane, they also suffer, but more slowly. The wizards who made the gate discovered all of this and wanted to be sure that no single person could use the army."
"They created two keys. One key is used on the gate, to open the passage. The other key is the throne of the keep. The one who sits on the throne is master of the army."
"Because your enemy is already on the move with his armies. He comes to massacre all who live in the north, because of a prophesy that speaks of his downfall."
"I can tell you no more, though. Not until you sit safely upon your throne in the keep."
"I found a prophesy that led me north. I then found the key that the old lord had left in the gate. I took the key and studied the prophesy for many years, before I headed south again."
"Once certain conditions of the prophesy are met, I will reveal the rest to you. For now, you need to trust me, at least until I can prove the truth of my words."
"With you on the throne, I can go to the gate and summon the undead army. Then you will have the force to destroy your enemy."
"I cannot tell you any more about the future, but I know that you will need a strength of arms not present here in the north. Your enemy is already on the march."
"I cannot tell you that. Not yet. Once you are on the throne and you are surrounded by powerful defenders, then my fears will be eased and I will tell you of the prophesy."
"Your enemy is so powerful, that should I speak his name, it is possible that he will be able to pinpoint our exact location."
"Yes. He found the first key, but couldn't control the undead army. He entered their realm with his army and perished. Perhaps his corpse has even joined the army."

"They were murdered, shortly after you were born. I cannot tell you more than that, but I promise you, I will. Once we have cemented our alliance and you are in control of the north, then I will reveal our enemy."

"He is powerful, and you will need all the help you can get to defeat him. Even if you decide to kill me, it will not stop him. He will hunt you down, just as he hunted down your father and killed him."
"Had I not managed to spirit you away, you too would be dead. He killed your mother, just because she loved your father."
"What would you like to speak of?"
"Really? I would like you to think back to your first foray to the gates of Keep Cyan. If I remember correctly, all it took was that meddling witchwoman, Yenna, and you were dead."
"There is a prophesy. Once certain conditions are fulfilled, I will be able to speak it to you. Until then, you cannot know, or you might balk at your destiny."
"No. If you cannot accept my word that it is in your best interest not to know yet, then take this as a means of keeping myself alive."
"I know the blood lust in you is probably driving you to want to destroy me. If you kill me, you will never know who killed your parents."
"I escaped my home plane while my master was battling a hero on another plane. I found myself in this plane, alone and without anything to assist me, besides my own natural abilities."
"I found myself in the southern city of Telmaki and I began to steal clothing, food and anything else that caught my eye. It was easy, as I would simply assume the appearance of someone I met."
"I even got to attend the execution of some of the original people I imitated. It was... interesting. Unfortunately I stayed too long and a strange man came to town. A demonhunter."

LinkComment.value: if PC talked to Momma Ji about her husband
if MW told PC about being a demonhunter

value.0: "Think about the fact that you are part demon too. You might not find it so noble. Demonhunters don't care if you claim to be good. They don't believe in reformed demons."
"I found him. I was fascinated as I watched him explore the city, following the minutest clues of each crime. How did he know it was a demon? Instinct, I would guess."
"Don't jump ahead of the story! I was fascinated as I watched him explore the city, following the minutest clues of each crime. How did he know it was a demon? Instinct, I would guess."
"I took too many chances, assuming the forms of people who were unlikely to have committed such crimes. I even managed to get a priest burned at the stake for assaulting a young noblewoman."
"He put it all together and got closer and closer to finding me."
"I decided I would be better off taking the initiative, so I went to him. I assumed a pleasing shape, similar to this, but with less wing, larger breasts."
"Then I seduced him and married him. It never fails to amaze me how easy it is to control a man with a little provocative clothing and a good leer. It's the leer that's really important."
"Then, once I was with child, I revealed myself to him for what I really was. I hoped he would consider our child and believe me when I said I was reformed."
"No. He was repulsed and drew his weapon on me. I did what I had to do. I assumed a much larger form, then tore his head off."
"It was. You have no idea how hard it is to fight the impulses that drive me. I have a heritage that is frightening, but powerful. You share this heritage."
"I know. You have no idea how hard it is to fight the impulses that drive me. I have a heritage that is frightening, but powerful. You share this heritage."
"Surely you have noticed moments when your heart races at the kill? Try that magnified by one hundred and you will begin to understand just how restrained I really am."
"Now, have you heard enough, or do you have other questions?"
"If you kill me, you will never discover who killed your parents, until it is too late and his armies are upon you. You need me. You need every ally you can get."
"Good. I will not allow you to kill me. If you even attempt it, I shall flee and let you face your enemy alone. When he is done with you, then I shall have more children."
"I will not allow you to kill me. If you even attempt it, I shall flee and let you face your enemy alone. When he is done with you, then I shall have more children."
"Let us face this enemy together. Let me prove that I am an honest person, despite my heritage. Despite your heritage."
"Then goodbye. If you should somehow survive your enemy, I might return. We can do battle then, or if your mind has become less closed, perhaps we shall work together towards greater things."

Comment.value:
Take away weapon and put it in a chest nearby. 
Create a duplicate image of the pc, with the new ghost effects around it 
the conversation will then have to be set up with the new creature's tag attached.

value.0: "A good idea. How about I let him take on his true form. When you are satisfied, he can become your weapon again."
"Hello, <FirstName>. It is about time we met face-to-face. What questions do you have for me?"
"Aye. I have enjoyed every moment I have spent with you. It is almost as good as being alive again. Even better, in some ways. I don't have to worry about myself getting killed anymore."
"Not yet. Someday I might wish to make the journey to the next world, but for now, I like what we are doing together."
"Ah, she is an interesting creature, isn't she. She can be everything a man or woman could desire, yet her base instincts give her an edge of danger that you are unlikely to find in any other mate."
"I do not wish to recount the days of my seduction, nor the day in which I found out I was betrayed. She kept my soul, never allowing it to be released to the realm of Mistress Death."
"After some time, I discovered that I no longer wanted to be parted from her. I watched her raise our child, with more love than I could have expected."
"I also watched her weep at the death of our child, as she fled with you cuddled to her breast. I am not saying that she is perfect, nor that she doesn't have a wide streak of evil in her."
"But there is also good in her. I can see that now. That is why she deserves my help. That is why she deserves your help, also."
"I was born in the southern highlands and raised with a weapon in my hand. My clan, for all races in the highlands belong to a clan, worshipped a demon called Gishtara."
"One day our shaman held a special ordeal, summoning the demon to support his worshippers. The shaman lost control of his abomination, and it turned on my people."
"I was one of the few survivors. I dragged my body to a neighboring clan, holding my intestines in with one hand, pulling myself forward with my other."
"Indeed. I dedicated my life to the destruction of all demons and their spawn."
"Can a creature such as her ever fully tell the truth? I don't know. But the essence of what she has told you is true. Some details she has omitted, some embellished."
"But I do think you will need her for the trials ahead. Your enemy, though I cannot tell you who it is, is one tough bastard. You'll need all the help you can get."
"Very well, I shall transform back into your weapon now. Best of luck, <FirstName>. I shall always be with you."
"We shall awaken the undead army of the Nether Planes and use it to defeat your implacable foe!"
"I have no desire to be the ruler of anything. I simply wish to see my offspring succeed... to leave a legacy behind me. Someday I will die, though my life has seemed immortal so far."
"I will serve you to the best of my ability. You shall rule the keep, not as a petty lord, but as the King of the North!"
"And?"
"Then we may proceed. Let us go and claim your army. Let us go and claim your destiny... King of the North!"
"But first you should gather your reward from the illithid's treasure. It had some very useful items stored up. Every advantage we can gain, we will need."
"I should have thought that was obvious. He was your half-brother. One of you was bound to win... I wanted only the best. Now, let's go."
"Do you think I have kept you alive for this long, just to betray and destroy you? Be rational. If you want to, you can betray and destroy me later, after your enemy is dead."
"By that time, I think you will know you can trust me. You shall see."
"The only way you stand a chance at defeating your enemy, even with the undead army, is if you can neutralize some of his allies, or even get them to join you."
"Politically, a petty lordling in the north doesn't count for much of anything, but as king, you would be an attractive alternative."

LinkComment.value: if pc never spoke to Momma Ji about the army.

value.0: "By now my words might have revealed who your enemy is, but do not make reference to him. Not yet. You must trust me in this."
"It is of no consequence. When you left the keep, your friend, Alias, killed the new lord and then, when she was caught, she told the council that she did it for the sake of the keep."
"She told them that the keep was doomed, if they did not accept you as their King!"

Comment.value: have momma ji transform into alias,

value.0: "Well, someone who looked like her. Don't worry, she was very persuasive. She is imprisoned, but the people have declared you as their new ruler. They eagerly await your return."

Comment.value: then transform back on the continue

value.0: "If you are worried about the child, don't. Once you return, you can assume your role as the new King of the North and set her free."
"People will always wonder. I mean, you lost. Your grip on power is that much more tenuous. You will find it will be harder to get people to agree with you, to work with you."
"In the end, they will do it to survive, but not without some resentment. I was disappointed in your performance. It really wasn't that difficult. I wish you had tried harder."

LinkComment.value: if pc never spoke to Momma Ji about the army.

value.0: "But it matters not. You are still going to be crowned, King of the North. Like it or not."

LinkComment.value: if pc never spoke to Momma Ji about the army.

value.0: "A bit of a formality here, I'm afraid. No queen can rule the north, but a female king can. Don't ask me why, it is just bound up in some stupid tradition."
"Go ahead and ask then."

value.0: "It is all quite easy. It is... a part of my nature. I was trained to be this way, and I learned quickly.

"Momma Dane?"
"Who are you?"
"What do you mean?"
"What is your true form?"
"You have wings!"
"You are a succubus?"
"Trained for what?"
"What are you?"
"So you are evil?"
"So, you are a demon."
"Who was your master?"
"And what are your plans now?"
"I have made a decision."
"Why do you need an ally?"
